---
name: create-instructions
agent: Instructions Generator
---
Take the information below and generate an agent instructions .md file for it in the /docs directory. If a .md file is provided, use it, otherwise generate an appropriate filename based on the content. Make sure instructions are concise, clear and not too long. Make sure to update the AGENTS.md file with a link to the new instructions file and a brief summary of what it contains. If no relevant information is provided, ask for clarification.
